name: Mitigation Playbook for Unauthorized PowerShell Execution
description: This playbook addresses the incident where an attacker exploited a PowerShell script for persistence after gaining network access via phishing.

action--9b2a567b-df13-45e6-a234-89417fe3.name: Kill malicious PowerShell process
action--9b2a567b-df13-45e6-a234-89417fe3.description: Terminate any malicious PowerShell processes that were executed.

action--7e3c4a65-c812-49f9-bc91-def2a759.name: Isolate compromised host from the network
action--7e3c4a65-c812-49f9-bc91-def2a759.description: Disconnect the compromised host from the network to prevent further data exfiltration.

action--5c8e9a21-d216-4e14-8746-02d234a7.name: Scan and remove downloaded payloads
action--5c8e9a21-d216-4e14-8746-02d234a7.description: Scan the system for any downloaded payloads and remove them if found.

action--37e29d8c-1dd2-4c93-ace5-8f7e9e14.name: Delete newly created malicious service
action--37e29d8c-1dd2-4c93-ace5-8f7e9e14.description: Disable and stop any malicious services that were created.

action--4f2a7d1b-2345-49c8-bb99-a7d7a9e4.name: Verify all known scripts are legitimate
action--4f2a7d1b-2345-49c8-bb99-a7d7a9e4.description: Cross-reference scripts with a whitelist of legitimate scripts.

action--ae64b237-71da-4d2d-bbb2-ad012ef2.name: Restore network connectivity post-remediation
action--ae64b237-71da-4d2d-bbb2-ad012ef2.description: Reconnect the isolated host to the network if all scans are clean.
